TextView.android:text: 1 Abbreviated Wordsâˆ’in Families Many long words may be abbreviated in shorthand by dropping the endings. This device is also used in longhand, as Jan. for January. The extent to which you use this device will depend on your familiarity with the words and with the subject matter of the dictation. When in doubt, write it out! The ending of a word is not dropped when a special shorthand word ending has been provided, such as -lity, in ability.
Notice how many of the words written with this abbreviating device fall naturally into families of similar endings.
